text: @honmameikoanohana i commented and forgot about it then here you come attention seeking. Bye, have a wonderful day of being alone and sad on the internet. 👋🏽

But the back lash i have seen come from male accounts. And ive seen 1 female who said she was upset. But go off i guess. I dont care.

@_probably_lucoa_ you got to remember most people will not bother to convert there car they’ll get a new one so what are we going to do with the old. We can recycle them but that takes gas and or diesel to run the machines
@sound_bustor it's not going to be overnight, but people have been discovering a bunch of new ways to run cars and such.

@_probably_lucoa_ good luck converting everyone to use less electricity because gas is best fuel we got and to get rid of it makes everyone’s car useless so then you got all these gas cars all over place and they can’t stay there so now what?

@sound_bustor plastic, gasoline, nuclear power, and non biodegradables would have to go. Those are the main polluters. And we need to plant more trees, not just trees but flowers and bushes and crops and stuff.
@_probably_lucoa_ but what would it cost
@sound_bustor there's nothing we can do to fix it, but we can keep it from breaking entirely.
@_probably_lucoa_ even if it’s dying there’s no possible way to fix it. Even we do what would it cost and I’m not talking money
@sound_bustor Even if you hate snow it's still not healthy. Our planet is dying, and there are other places you could go to be warm.

@_probably_lucoa_ my opinion I hate snow and so I would like nothing more than warm up the atmosphere plus California and Florida are both worst states in USA but that’s just my opinion but you also have good point is that society a good measure how well it works is there treatment of women for example USA is by far the best in treatment of women if anything women are kicking men’s asses in every field except prison but as for Middle East being a woman could be very much a death sentence

@sound_bustor then I guess we really fucked up, huh? If we can't change how we treat women, then there's no way we can change how we treat our planet, meaning that in about 20 years a bunch of us are gonna drown because the polar ice caps have melted.
@_probably_lucoa_ and what if people don’t
@sound_bustor no, we can't, but we can ask them to try. Erasing centuries of damage won't be overnight, but maybe one day, we'll all be okay.
@_probably_lucoa_ that will only change in time you can’t force people to think

@sound_bustor well, first off, maybe don't judge women for not shaving and stuff. Most men don't shave, so why should we? And then maybe if you see a guy lurking around a store or something and eyeing a woman suspiciously, ask if she noticed it and would like to be walked to her car or something. It's the little things that can make a big difference.
@_probably_lucoa_ what can we do to fix it?

@sound_bustor not everybody has the time to do a military level fitness course. People have jobs, school, families, etc. And when people can barely move, of course it's a problem. That is in no way natural, but maybe being 200 when you're average is about 170 isn't that bad. Bodies come in all shapes and sizes and not a single one will be perfect. I'm talking about hating on girls that have to wear XLs and get shamed for it, not the people on "My 600 pound life"

@_probably_lucoa_ yea if u workout and diet wrongly then of course it won’t work but correctly it will. I joined army I started at 160 pounds and under constant fitness training and eating plain but to me I like the taste food I lost over 20 pounds in 8 weeks. I get not everyone body is same but to say workout and diet don’t work is to promote a unhealthy life style. What good is to come from being obese. Also I’m talking obese not 2 pounds overweight by your height or have a little bit of flab that’s fine. I’m talking about where it’s a challenge to walk or move that’s what I’m talking about
@sound_bustor they don't lack personal care. There's a lot of science behind it and usually the only way to become skinnier is to starve. Workouts and diets don't actually work.

@_probably_lucoa_ then it doesn’t matter. Certain men want certain things and certain women want certain things plus I think now a days were better about it. But for example I wouldn’t date a overweight person not because I hate them but I don’t like that plus it shows they have poor care in there body but some guys adore big girls it’s just personal preference
@sound_bustor why should it matter? It's not like sex is all that a relationship should be. There are tons of other factors.
@_probably_lucoa_ let me ask you this would u either date a guy with a small dick or a large one. Let’s say personality is same only difference is penis size
@sound_bustor and it's not all men, but it's a large enough amount that we need to do something about it.

@sound_bustor yeah, but socially, people have become so used to only ever viewing hypersexualized women that they'll bash on a girl just for not shaving her legs or something. I'd rather not be bullied and called ugly and gross.

@_probably_lucoa_ you don’t have to be. Beauty is in the eyes of the be holder so if some guys don’t like your looks whatever. Men are aren’t obligated to like you same with women and it’s not all men.
@sound_bustor *that maybe

@sound_bustor women have to be hairless, wear a fuck ton of makeup (even if a lot of men mock us if we do,) we have to have long, perfect hair, a certain weight range, an hourglass figure. We have to be cookie cutter, Barbie doll, basic, unoriginal toys. I think thataybe, just maybe, men can deal with the standard of not being an asshole and trying to stop others from being one.
@_probably_lucoa_ what do u mean?
@sound_bustor Major companies have enforced the strict standards females have to deal with every day. I think it's about time that they make up for that.
They really should smile more, they look so much nicer when they smile.

@neena_diaz I just don’t like idea of an ad that focus on political opinions and or certain topics other than the product like they make razors and shaving equipment not therapy or family training sessions it doesn’t make logical sense but I forget that in world of social justice logic goes out the fucking window
@sound_bustor they can say what they want if they have the $$$ can’t they?!! 😂

I don’t understand why everything political and before it’s said I’m not picking a side I’m just saying a company who makes razors doesn’t need to market a political opinion they need to market the actual product so now we live in a age where if your political opinions are different than most instead of questions and debate we openly attack them to death. Idk I’m just venting because I think everyone is being stupid. The boycotters, feminist, Gillette.
😂😂😂 I find this hilarious, that commercial was great! But the men got triggered rip
